title: Enable VOLTE on pixel 3 XL
content: Lately I'm unable to place any outgoing call  or get incoming calls. I just talked to Airtel customer care and they told me that I have to enable VOLTE option and restart my phone but I'm not seeing any option for enabling VOLTE. Please guide what am I doing wrong here.
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3 XL
